ygData.subject: Re: I heard about some equipment...
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok, I have a question for you all.  I am a level 25 Bard on the Rallos Zek server.  I have read with interest your emails, suggestions, and tips, but I seem to
ygData.messageBody:
Ok, I have a question for you all. I am a level 25 Bard on the Rallos Zek
server. I have read with interest your emails, suggestions, and tips, but I
seem to have a problem. I can not use the same songs in the same way as
you. My sleep song puts EVERYONE but my party to sleep, including other
players, in fact any NON Party song effects mobs and players. This is a
real disadvantage to me I believe. Anyone on RZ with any suggestions? Or
anyone else ? Thanks


Infiniti
Rallos Zek
